00024 Camera::~Camera(){
00025         delete[] array;
00026         //delete capture;
00027         delete map;
00028 
00029         Camera::killThread = true;
00030         void * status;
00031         pthread_join(this->dataDumpThread,&status);

00035 void Camera::loadConfiguration(const mrpt::utils::CConfigFileBase & config, const std::string & sectionName) {
00036         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Reading config file..." << endl;
00037 
00038         GRID_SIZE = config.read_int(sectionName, "grid_size", 10);
00039         PERCENT_FILLED = config.read_double(sectionName, "percent_filled", .3);
00040         THRESHOLD = config.read_int(sectionName, "threshold", 20);
00041         ERODE_AMOUNT = config.read_int(sectionName, "erode_amount", 2);
00042         HSV_VECTOR = config.read_int(sectionName, "hsv_vector", 1);
00043 
00044         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Grid size: " << GRID_SIZE << endl;
00045         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Percent filled: " << PERCENT_FILLED << endl;
00046         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Threshold: " << THRESHOLD << endl;
00047         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Erode amount: " << ERODE_AMOUNT << endl;
00048         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "HSV vector: " << HSV_VECTOR << endl;
00049 
00050         if(GRID_SIZE <= 0)                      LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Grid size is negative or zero" << endl;
00051         if(PERCENT_FILLED <= 0)         LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Percent filled is negative or 0" << endl;
00052         if(PERCENT_FILLED > 1.0)        LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Percent filled is greater than 1" << endl;
00053         if(THRESHOLD < 0)                       LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Threshold is negative, must be between 0 and 255" << endl;
00054         if(THRESHOLD > 255)             LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Threshold is too high, must be between 0 and 255" << endl;
00055         if(ERODE_AMOUNT < 0)            LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Erode amount must be greater than 0" << endl;
00056         if(HSV_VECTOR < 0)                      LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "hsv vector is negative, must be between 0 and 3" << endl;
00057         if(HSV_VECTOR > 3)                      LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "hsv vector is too high, must be between 0 and 3" << endl;
00058 }

00060 void Camera::init(){
00061         namedWindow("debug", 1);
00062 
00063         array = new bool[GRID_SIZE * GRID_SIZE];
00064         map = new mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap;
00065         //capture = new VideoCapture(0);
00066 
00067         // check to see if camera was opened
00068         if(!capture.isOpened()){
00069                 LOG_CAMERA(FATAL) << "Error opening camera" << endl;
00070         }
00071 
00072         getFrame(this->image);
00073         pthread_attr_init(&dataDumpThreadAttr);
00074         pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&dataDumpThreadAttr, PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE);
00075         pthread_create( &dataDumpThread, &dataDumpThreadAttr, Camera::cameraDataShow, &image );
00076 
00077         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Started camera..." << endl;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Camera::sensorProcess() {
00081         // clear out old map
00082         if(map != NULL){
00083                 delete map;
00084                 map = new mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap;
00085 
00086                 LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Deleted old map, creating new one...";
00087         }
00088 
00089         // Putting data in map
00090         getObstacles(*map);
00091 
00092 }

00094 SensorData * Camera::getData() {
00095         // Wrapping data in CameraData object
00096         return new CameraData(*map);
00097 }

00103 void Camera::getObstacles(mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap & map){
00104 
00105         initializeArray(array);
00106         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Initialized array..." << endl;
00107 
00108         getFrame(image);
00109         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Got frame..." << endl;
00110 
00111         DEBUG_COMMAND(imshow("test", image));
00112         DEBUG_COMMAND(waitKey());
00113 
00114         getWhite(image);
00115         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Thresholded to white..." << endl;
00116         DEBUG_COMMAND(imshow("test", image));
00117         DEBUG_COMMAND(waitKey());
00118 
00119         distort(image);
00120         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Distorted image..." << endl;
00121         DEBUG_COMMAND(imshow("test", image));
00122         DEBUG_COMMAND(waitKey());
00123 
00124         hasObstacles(array, image);
00125         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Checked for obstacles..." << endl;
00126 
00127         insertObstacles(map, GRID_SIZE, array);
00128         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG3) << "Inserted obstacles into map..." << endl;
00129 
00130 }

00167 void Camera::insertObstacles(mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap & map, int size, bool * array){
00168         int pixel_x;
00169         int pixel_y;
00170         double x;
00171         double y;
00172 
00173         for(int i = 0; i < size; i++){
00174                 for(int j = 0; j < size; j++){
00175 
00176                         if(array[i * size + j]){
00177                                 pixel_x = j * (640/size);
00178                                 pixel_y = 480 - (i * (480/size));
00179 
00180                                 // each pixel is .00635 meters high and wide
00181                                 x = ((pixel_x - 240) * .00635);
00182                                 y = ((pixel_y * .00635) + .914);
00183 
00184                                 map.insertPoint(x, y);
00185                         }
00186                 }
00187 
00188         }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void Camera::hasObstacles(bool * array, Mat & image){
00192         int height = image.rows / GRID_SIZE;
00193         int width = image.cols / GRID_SIZE;
00194 
00195 
00196         int obstacleThreshold = 255 * PERCENT_FILLED;
00197         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG4) << "\tObstacle threshold: " << obstacleThreshold << endl;
00198         //DEBUG_COMMAND(namedWindow("test2", 1));
00199 
00200         for(int i = 0; i < GRID_SIZE; i++){
00201                 for(int j = 0; j < GRID_SIZE; j++){
00202                         Mat roi = image(Rect(width * j, height * i, width, height));
00203                         Scalar value = mean(roi);
00204 
00205                         LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG4) << "\tMean: " << value[0] << endl;
00206                         if(value[0] > obstacleThreshold){
00207                                 array[(i * GRID_SIZE) + j] = true;
00208                                 roi = Scalar(155);
00209 
00210                                 LOG_CAMERA(DEBUG4) << "\t\tFound an obstacle..." << endl;
00211                                 DEBUG_COMMAND(imshow("test", image));
00212                                 DEBUG_COMMAND(waitKey());
00213 
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216         }
00217 }

00219 void Camera::getWhite(Mat & image){
00220         // vect[2] seems to be the best for white
00221         Mat white = convertRGBtoHSV(image)[HSV_VECTOR];
00222 
00224         threshold(white, white, THRESHOLD, 255, THRESH_BINARY_INV);
00225 
00226         erode(white, white, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), ERODE_AMOUNT);
00227         dilate(white, white, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), ERODE_AMOUNT);
00228 
00229 
00230 /*
00231         Mat linedWhite;
00232         cvtColor( white, linedWhite, CV_GRAY2BGR );
00233 
00234     vector<Vec4i> lines;
00235     HoughLinesP( white, lines, 1, CV_PI/180, 80, 10, 10 );
00236     for( size_t i = 0; i < lines.size(); i++ )
00237     {
00238         line( linedWhite, Point(lines[i][0], lines[i][1]),
00239             Point(lines[i][2], lines[i][3]), Scalar(0,0,255), 3, 8 );
00240     }
00241 */
00242 
00243         image = white.clone();
00244 }

00246 void Camera::distort(Mat & src){
00247         Point2f srcQuad[4], dstQuad[4];
00248         Mat dst;
00249 
00250         dst = Mat::zeros(src.size(), src.type());
00251 
00252         // rows == height
00253         // cols == width
00254 
00255         srcQuad[0].x = 0;
00256         srcQuad[0].y = 0;
00257         srcQuad[1].x = src.cols - 1;
00258         srcQuad[1].y = 0;
00259         srcQuad[2].x = 0;
00260         srcQuad[2].y = src.rows - 1;
00261         srcQuad[3].x = src.cols - 1;
00262         srcQuad[3].y = src.rows - 1;
00263 
00264 
00265         dstQuad[0].x = 97; //dst Top Left
00266         dstQuad[0].y = 0;
00267         dstQuad[1].x = 543; //dst Top Right
00268         dstQuad[1].y = 0;
00269         dstQuad[2].x = 214; //dst Bottom Left
00270         dstQuad[2].y = src.rows-1;
00271         dstQuad[3].x = 426; //dst  Bottom Right
00272         dstQuad[3].y = src.rows-1;
00273 
00274         Mat warp_matrix = getPerspectiveTransform(srcQuad, dstQuad);
00275 
00276         warpPerspective( src, dst, warp_matrix, src.size() );
00277 
00278         src = dst.clone();
00279 
00280 }

00282 void inline Camera::initializeArray(bool * array){
00283         for(int i = 0; i < GRID_SIZE * GRID_SIZE; i++){
00284                 array[i] = false;
00285         }
00286 }

00288 vector<Mat> Camera::convertRGBtoHSV(Mat & image){
00289         Mat temp = image.clone();
00290         cvtColor(temp, temp, CV_RGB2HSV);
00291 
00292         // split multi-channel picture into single-channels
00293         vector<Mat> vect(image.channels());
00294         split(temp, vect);
00295 
00296         return vect;
00297 }
